name: 傅子恒
objective: This course takes new media art as its scope and creative coding as its main path, leading students to deeply explore the power and beauty which programming media can express. The course contents include new media art appreciation, creative programming language, common algorithms for creative programming, render and shader. By triggering coding idea from aesthetics, we can realize more fantastic interactive contents with powerful penetration.

W1	Introduction
W2	NodeBox3
W3	NodeBox3
W4	Javascript OOP

W8	P5.js
W9	Midterm Report
W10	Algorithm

W12	Algorithm
W13	Algorithm
W14	Shader
W15	Shader
W16	Shader
W17	Shader
W18	Final Project Demo
scorePolicy:
Homework: 40
Midterm Report: 20
Final project: 30
Attendance and Discussion: 10
consultation: We will have MS Teams group once the course starts. Please make sure you can login MS Teams by your school account.
